description: As a Full-Stack Engineer at Quacon, I focused on building internal systems and client applications with Laravel and MySQL. I designed RESTful APIs, optimized performance, and worked closely with cross-functional teams to ensure reliable integrations. I also provided technical training to clients and internal teams for effective system adoption.

As a Full-Stack Engineer at PLABS.ID, I was responsible for developing web applications using Laravel, Golang, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and Oracle. I collaborated with PMs, UI/UX designers, DevOps, and frontend teams to deliver scalable systems, while also contributing to code reviews, technical documentation, and mentoring interns in full-stack development.
